content.title: Uses
content.description: Grown for its unique twisted dry fruits. Fruit appears a screw shaped. Plant is used as a folk medicine to treat snake bite, diarrhoea and constipation of new born baby. Antioxidant, hypolipidaemic, antibacterial, cardiac antioxidant, antiperoxidative potency, brain-antioxidation potency, anticancer activity, antinociceptive activity, hepatoprotective activity, anti-diarrheal activity & wormicidal activity are documented. Phytochemicals present in the fruit include: 49-O-b-D-glucopyranosyl rosmarinic acid, 4,49-O-di-b-D-glucopyranosyl rosmarinic acid and 2R-O-(49-O-b-D-glucopyranosyl caffeoyl)-3-(4-hydroxyphenyl) isorinic acid, rosmarinic acid.
